title: La Petite Illustration
additional-notes: This supplement to L'Illustration ran multiple series.  Some included plays that were renewed under Drama instead of under Contributions to Periodicals.  We have not systematically surveyed Drama renewals, and there may be renewed plays published in this periodical not shown here.
